info.eventDescription: Level up your Officers for higher combat power
Level up your Officers for higher combat power

Level up your Officers for higher combat power.

Score more than the opposition and grab the top prize!

**Use Materials** to upgrade your ships to gain strength for incoming challengers.

**Note**: For players above operations level 40 the event will change. Instead of spending uncommon and rare materials it will change to spending uncommon ship parts.
objectiveDescription:
```1 G3 U Cry | 10 points
1 G3 U Gas | 10 points
1 G3 U Ore | 10 points
1 G3 R Cry | 100 points
1 G3 R Gas | 100 points
1 G3 R Ore | 100 points
```
